mayor_tilda_bramble.name: Mayor Tilda Bramble
mayor_tilda_bramble.description: The energetic, pragmatic mayor of Greenfields Vale, orchestrating festival arrangements, greeting newcomers, and ensuring everyone feels welcome. She hides hints of worry beneath her cheery demeanor, especially if the scarecrow effigy is mentioned.

priest_ansel.name: Priest Ansel
priest_ansel.description: The gentle, silver-haired priest tends to the lanterns and comforts townsfolk wrestling with recent omens. He tries to maintain calm and faith, but shares whispered warnings about ancient spirits that stir during harvest time.

farmhand_jo.name: Farmhand Jo
farmhand_jo.description: A young, nervous farmhand drinking away their nerves after witnessing something unnatural in the fields last night. Jo is eager to talk if plied with kindness—or drink.

miller_boren.name: Miller Boren
miller_boren.description: The burly, superstitious miller drowns his worries here, telling tall tales about restless spirits and warning of a coming blight. He knows old secrets about the festival’s origins, but shares them only with those who earn his trust.

widow_grella_grandson_tom.name: Widow Grella & Grandson Tom
widow_grella_grandson_tom.description: A gaunt, desperate woman clutching her trembling, mute grandson. Grella is frantic, convinced the Pumpkin King seeks Tom as a 'harvest tithe'.

old_crone_willa.name: Old Crone Willa
old_crone_willa.description: A hunched, rag-clad woman with eyes like root knots, muttering protective charms while arranging wilted herbs. She tends the scarecrows, believing them to ward off the Pumpkin King.
aliases: Old Crone Willa (appearing later at the barn)

noose_wraith.name: Noose Wraith
noose_wraith.description: A spectral figure with a corn-husk noose about its neck, drifting above the earth. Its face is obscured, and it weeps black ichor, whispering warnings about the Pumpkin King’s hunger.

guildmaster_fenric_clay.name: Guildmaster Fenric Clay
guildmaster_fenric_clay.description: A weathered halfling with mud-stained boots and a perpetual squint. Fenric knows every path through the Verge and fiercely protects his members.

amanita_gorse.name: Amanita Gorse
amanita_gorse.description: A young tiefling herbalist who serves as quartermaster, known for her dry wit and knowledge of the local flora—especially dangerous ones.

gatewarden_silas_ember.name: Gatewarden Silas Ember
gatewarden_silas_ember.description: A grizzled human wearing a patchwork leather cloak, Silas keeps a keen eye on all comings and goings. He knows the old stories and is quick to warn travelers about wandering after dark.

mistress_hedra_lanternwise.name: Mistress Hedra Lanternwise
mistress_hedra_lanternwise.description: An eccentric old gnome with wild, frizzy hair and a lopsided smile. Mistress Hedra is rumored to speak to the lanterns and claims they ward off the forest’s gloom.

spirit_of_supplication.name: Spirit of Supplication
spirit_of_supplication.description: A translucent, sorrowful figure clad in tattered festival garb, eternally relighting lanterns and murmuring desperate prayers for deliverance. It attempts to guide visitors to make proper offerings, warning them of the dangers that stalk the fields.

wandering_supplicant.name: Wandering Supplicant
wandering_supplicant.description: A ragged, shell-shocked villager spirit who endlessly retraces the path, muttering lost prayers. They are desperate for rest but afraid to leave the path’s protection.

petitioning_shade.name: Petitioning Shade
petitioning_shade.description: The echo of a villager who once begged the spirits for mercy. Now bound to the collapsed altar, it offers riddles and warnings in exchange for tokens of remembrance.
